404.CARD_DESCRIPTION: 找不到您要查找的页面

500.CARD_DESCRIPTION: 处理您的请求时出现问题，请重试或报告以获取支持

api.PRICING_HEADER: 开始将VPN添加到您的软件解决方案
api.PRICING_DESC: 选择最适合您的计划。 您还可以免费试用该API，以供个人使用/用于小型项目
api.DASHBOARD_SERVER_CONFIGURATION_DESC: 您可以从API检索%s服务器配置，这将在每个结算周期重置
api.DASHBOARD_BILLING_CYCLE_DESC: 使用API时，系统会自动处理您的帐单
api.DASHBOARD_API_KEY_DESC: 使用此访问密钥，您可以向API进行身份验证并发出有效请求

index.SUPPORT_SERVICE_TEXT: 喜欢免费服务，并希望它能持续到将来吗？
index.DONATE_TEXT: 我们通过PayPal接受捐款，如果您有兴趣（无义务），您可以通过给我们钱来购买一杯咖啡来捐款支持我们
index.API_TEXT: 如果要在软件，项目或服务器中使用OpenBlu，则可以使用OpenBlu API轻松访问所有可用的服务器。 您可以从免费套餐（受限制的请求）开始，然后确定它是否适合您。
index.CARD_POPULAR_SERVERS_TEXT: 会话最多的最受欢迎的服务器
index.CALLBACK_100: 尝试处理您的请求时出现意外错误
index.CALLBACK_101: Intellivoid帐户返回了服务器无法理解的响应
index.CALLBACK_102: 尝试处理身份验证时出错：%s
index.CALLBACK_104: 该服务器不支持使用的身份验证方法

purchase.DETAILS_DESC: Please confirm the purchase of this subscription.
purchase.PROMOTION_DESC: If you have a promotion code to receive a special offer, you can enter it below and verify it
purchase.CALLBACK_101: You have insufficient funds in your account to start this subscription
purchase.CALLBACK_102: You are not allowed to make any purchases, please contact support
purchase.CALLBACK_103: A subscription is already active, this transaction cannot be completed

server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_IP_ADDRESS_DESC: The IP Address of the remote VPN Server
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_COUNTRY_DESC: The country that this server is based in
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_CURRENT_SESSIONS_DES: The total amount of users that are currently connected
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_TOTAL_SESSIONS_DESC: The total amount of sessions this server had (all time)
server.CARD_SERVER_DETAILS_ID_DESC: The ID of the OpenBlu VPN Server
server.CARD_CONNECT_OPENVPN_DESC: You can connect to this server using a OpenVPN client with any supported device, the download to the configuration file (.ovpn) is available below
server.CARD_CONNECT_CLIENT_DESC: By clicking connect your client will start a OpenVPN session, you can close the connection by closing the OpenVPN Client.
server.NOTIFICATION_AUTH_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: To prevent spam & abuse, you need to login/register to download this configuration file
server.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error while trying to process your request, try refreshing this page.
server.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STARTED_MESSAGE: Your OpenVPN Configuration file should start downloading

servers.PAGE_NOT_FOUND_ERROR: The requested page was not found, it might have been moved
servers.NO_SERVERS_AVAILABLE_ERROR: There are no servers available at the moment, please try again in a moment
servers.CALLBACK_100: The server you requested was not found or is not available on OpenBlu anymore
servers.NOTIFICATION_AUTH_REQUIRED_MESSAGE: To prevent spam & abuse, you need to login/register to download this configuration file
servers.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_ERROR_MESSAGE: There was an error while trying to process your request, try refreshing this page.
servers.NOTIFICATION_DOWNLOAD_STARTED_MESSAGE: Your OpenVPN Configuration file should start downloading

service_error.ERROR_CARD_DESC: There was an error while trying to verify contents about your account, this might be a programming error. Please contact support

support.CARD_DESC: Using this form below you can contact us to request technical support regarding OpenBlu or ask questions/make requests. Upon submitting your support form, you will receive a ticket number which will be used as a reference once we get back to you via Email.
support.EMAIL_LABEL: Email (Must be valid to get a response)
support.CALLBACK_100: There was an issue with your request, please make sure your browser is up to date
support.CALLBACK_101: The given Email address is invalid
support.CALLBACK_102: The given Subject is invalid, it must be greater than 5 characters but no greater than 130
support.CALLBACK_103: The given Message is invalid, it must be greater than 20 characters but no greater than 2500
support.CALLBACK_104: There was an unknown error while trying to process your report, please wait till Intellivoid resolves this issue
support.CALLBACK_105: Your report has been submitted, we will reach you shortly. Your ticket number is #%s
